name: Dave Gordon
text: Excellent service,  5-star. I ordered on the Pizza Hut app and all went smoothly. The app could use a little improvement though, like saving your order when changing location because they were closed.

name: mathew grijalva
text: I live in Indio right next to a Pizza Hut, but I would definitely make the drive just to come to this one. The staff is always amazing and very friendly. The last time I dined in, and my food was ready in 10 minutes. It was delicious, fresh and hot out of the oven. I love this place.

name: Aakash Rami
text: One of the Best Pizza Huts I've visited. Chain pizza stores are hit-and-miss depending on the store. This store is a great Pizza hut location. Pizza was made very good lots of cheese I ordered extra cheese they put extra cheese on. Cheese breadsticks were made very good. A great Pizza Hut.

name: Mini Hsu
text: Pizzas, pasta and wings 4 STARs. Since management discontinued their salad bar, the only choice for vegetables for this location...3 STARs were given. Service by Juan was awesome, dine in had great service. Clean restaurant with limited ‚Ä¶More

name: A A
text: The Brownie was perfectly made but my toppings on the supreme were all black burnt, other than that the customer service Juan provided was excellent. Juan was able to assist me with the issue. :) Thank you Juan.

name: Keath Graham
text: Great management.  They treat you like royalty.  The pizza is excellent.  The cook will even come out and ask if you liked his pizza and ask for tips on how he could make it better.  It's very clean and the manager makes you feel very welcome.  She really cares about her guests.

name: Boredom NeverOver
text: It's seriously overpriced for what you get. For two medium pizzas, an 8 piece bone out thing of wings, and four drinks, we spent $65. I could have gone somewhere else and spent that and have better quality food. ‚Ä¶More
